answerText: Abuja[10] Abuja is the capital of this West African country, having replaced its former capital in the southwest, Lagos.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 16 | 17 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Zuma Rock is known as the "Gateway to" this city, which lies inside the Federal Capital Territory. For 10 points each: [10] Name this planned city that became its nation's capital in 1991.
